# countiteration

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of countiteration is to count the number of iteration of each possibility of a variable from a tibble. This does not include the NA that can be found in the variable. 
This function doesn't work on numerical variable. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of countiteration from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("stat545ubc-2021/functions-mathiasdelhaye")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(countiteration)
counting_iteration(palmerpenguins::penguins, species)
```
